title: Wear Whatever Watch Face
summary: YouÂ´re not so strict with time management? Then get this Whatever watch face ;-)
description: Here you get a watch face with a nice font and a crazy order. You can choose from 6 different background colors. You can also show or hide the actual date and % of you battery. Date and battery can be set to visible or invisible in the Android companion app on your smartphone. The background color can be changed in the settings of the wearable device and also in the companion appof your smartphone. Ambient and Low Ambient mode is supported. Ambient Mode -> save battery, second hand will be disabled, resolution reduced.Low Ambient Mode -> save even more battery, background only black and white, second hand will be disabled
descriptionHTML:
Here you get a watch face with a nice font and a crazy order. You can choose from 6 different background colors. You can also show or hide the actual date and % of you battery.

Date and battery can be set to visible or invisible in the Android companion app on your smartphone.
The background color can be changed in the settings of the wearable device and also in the companion app
of your smartphone.

Ambient and Low Ambient mode is supported.

Ambient Mode -> save battery, second hand will be disabled, resolution reduced.

Low Ambient Mode -> save even more battery, background only black and white, second hand will be disabled
comments: Rip off!!! Looks cool, so purchased. The colour doesn't change when you tell it it, so am stuck with a creme background! I would like a refund!!
recentChanges: First Version of the Whatever Watch Face.
